name: Racing Highway Extreme Traffic
description:
Enjoy driving in the most real way! Select your car, upgrade it and speed up to win all the challenges in this amazing racing game!
Have fun like never before in this endless arcade racing simulator. Drive your car through highway traffic, select different modes, you can drive with rain or even snow, or enjoy in a sunny day at the road. Buy new cars and become the fastest driver.

SIMULATOR FEATURES
- Different cars & vehicles to choose
- Customization options: paint, wheels, nitro, steering wheel, brakes, etc
- 2 control modes: Gyro controller or tap screen
- Real 3D graphics
- Realistic car handling simulation

Drive as fast as you can and beat the scores! Win money to invest in upgrades and beat your opponents.
Compete with your friends and show your driver skills to become the road Master.

--This game is considered the best racing game for 2019--

Have fun!
